headline: Vivek Ramaswamy Sells $22.7 Million of Roivant Sciences Stock
summary: Vivek Ramaswamy sold more than $22 million worth of  Roivant Sciences  stock in three separate transactions last week, according to a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.  Ramaswamy founded Roivant Sciences in 2014 and served as CEO until 2021.  A Form 4 filed with the agency last week shows Ramaswamy sold 1,195,000 shares for $12.50 each on Sept. 3.
